channel.title: Problem Solving on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Problem Solving on Today I Learned

item.title: Problem Solving Skills
item.description: IOCE: Input, Output, Constraints, Edge Cases After understanding what the prompt is, list the input, output, constraints, and edge cases before planning the solution. Strategy(s): How can I get from my input to my output? A moment of being extra verbal and thinking out loud to brainstorm strategies After brainstorming the first strategy (write quick notes about it to remember), I can also come up with a second strategy, then identify trade-off.
